Title: Aye Papi
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Elle Johnson (written for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Madison Lintz
Plot: Bosch operates behind-the-scenes to expose wrongdoers. Killers are in the wind. Edgar deals with the fallout of a crucial choice.
